member.name: T:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute
member.summary: Class containing metadata to describe Sitefinity content.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the content tp be displayed in the selector. E.g Telerik.Sitefinity.News.Model.NewsItem For dynamic types the full Clr Type name is expected. E.g. Telerik.Sitefinity.DynamicTypes.Model.Pressreleases.PressRelease.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.IsFilterable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the filter logic will be applied for the content that has the attribute defined. This takes effect when no specific type is selected.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.AllowMultipleItemsSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether multiple items can be selected. Defaults to 'true'.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.OpenMultipleItemsSelection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selector for items to be opened directly and the input option to be skipped Defaults to 'false'.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.LiveData
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use live or master data in the selectors. Applicable for all content types except: Pages, Images, Videos and Documents.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.Provider
member.summary: Gets or sets a name of the provider; If none was specified we will show data from all providers.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.DisableInteraction
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable interaction with selected items.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.ShowSiteSelector
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the providers/sites selector in show all items dialog.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.AllowCreate
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether create item button is visible. Defaults to 'true'.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.ForceShouldShowAll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether show all button is visible.

member.name: P:Progress.Sitefinity.Renderer.Designers.Attributes.ContentAttribute.TypeBlacklist
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating which types to be filtered out. Blacklisted properties take precedence over whitelisted ones. Accepts a string with comma separated values. E.g. "Telerik.Sitefinity.News.Model.NewsItem, Telerik.Sitefinity.Blogs.Model.BlogPost".
